attributes.action: raise the legal age limit to buy alcohol from 18 to 21
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If America has this age limit whats the problem with Britain not having it. Drunken behaviour amongst youths can never be stopped fully but this measure should ease the pressure on off licences, police, etc

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
